A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am a life long\, die-hard Star Wars fan  who grew up in the '70s and '80s loving nothing more than Star Wars. Last Jedi  was the best Star Wars movie to date. I never thought I'd like anything more than Empire\, but this one did it. I've read all the books\, the comics\, I love this movie. It certainly wasn't what I was expecting\, but it was awesome!  *Thematic spoiler* it has a fresh take on that middle movie tragedy like Empire where all is apparently lost and i can't wait to see where it goes from here!
